articles.author: Padraic Halpin
articles.title: Ryanair boss says 'recessionary feel' may be limiting air ticket price rises - Reuters
articles.description: Ryanair CEO Michael O'Leary said on Monday that a "recessionary feel around Europe" could be a factor in slower-than-expected growth in airfares as the low-cost carrier posted record annual profits slightly ahead of expectations.

articles.title: Meteor streaks across the sky over Spain and Portugal - CGTN

articles.author: Gabriel Gavin
articles.title: US could sanction Georgia politicians to 'defend democracy' - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: A leaked draft bill seen by POLITICO would target ruling party lawmakers and law enforcement officers, as well as possible Russian agents in the country.
